Computer.name: Lynn's Battlestation
Computer.file: Must remember, the last two encrypted codes has passwords, the second encrypted code password is the first code, and the last one is the first and second code together.
Computer.encryptedFile: > To build the one you think witty, seek the nymph who sang oh so pretty. She lured him in with her song and grin, his wife must've thought it a pity.
